ReportCount.description: Pathology Report identifier coded sequentially from 1 to max number of pathology reports per individual

TumourCount.description: Tumour identifier coded sequentially from 1 to max number of tumours per pathology report. Dataset has one row per tumour.

DateSpecimenTaken.description: Specimen taken date. Missing is coded as null (blank)

DateSpecimenReceived.description: Specimen received in hospital laboratory. Missing is coded as null (blank)

PostNeoadjuvantChemo.description: Specimen taken after treatment (Chemotherapy or Endocrine)

Primary_Site_Side.description: Side of Primary Site. Missing is coded as null

R_Benign_Tumour.description: Type of right benign ovarian tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

R_Benign_Details.description: Details of right benign ovarian tumour (free text)

R_Borderline.description: Type of right borderline ovarian tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

R_Invasive.description: Right Invasive. Missing is coded as null (blank)

R_Epithelium.description: Right Epithelium. Missing not applicable coded as null (blank)

R_Epithelium_Other.description: Details of Right Epithelium Other (free text)

R_Grade_HL.description: Right Grade differentiation. Missing is coded as null (blank)

R_Primary_Germ_Cells.description: Right Germ (Egg) Cell Tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

R_Sex_Cord_Stromal_Cells.description: Right ovary sex Cord Stromal Tumour Cells (SCSTs). Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

L_Benign_Tumour.description: Type of left benign ovarian tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

L_Benign_Details.description: Details of left benign ovarian tumour (free text)

L_Borderline.description: Type of left borderline ovarian tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

L_Invasive.description: Left Invasive. Missing is coded as null (blank)

L_Epithelium.description: Left Epithelium. Missing not applicable coded as null (blank)

L_Epithelium_Other.description: Details of Left Epithelium Other (free text)

L_Grade_HL.description: Left Grade differentiation. Missing is coded as null (blank)

L_Primary_Germ_Cells.description: Left Germ (Egg) Cell Tumour. Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

L_Sex_Cord_Stromal_Cells.description: Left ovary sex Cord Stromal Tumour Cells (SCSTs). Missing / not applicable coded as null (blank)

ReportDat.description: Date of Report. Missing information is null (blank)

CoreDat.description: Date of Core Biopsy (if previously performed and indicated in the report or if the report is for a core biopsy - in this case ReportDat = CoreDat). Missing is coded null.

PostChemo.description: Date of Core Biopsy (if previously performed and indicated in the report or if the report is for a core biopsy - in this case ReportDat = CoreDat). Missing is coded null.
